short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Uncover the truth with this hilarious adult party game.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Get ready to take your game night to the next level with Truth or Drink, the fun Chrome extension that guarantees a memorable and laughter-filled experience.

This is not just a game, it's a party starter, an icebreaker, a boredom buster right in your browser! 

Choose from four fabulous categories and dive into a pool of more than 100 thrilling questions. Dare to break the routine and unleash the fun with Truth or Dare.

Add it to your Chrome now and let the good times roll!
